title: "A Knife to a Gun Fight" - The Crushing
itunes:title: "A Knife to a Gun Fight" - The Crushing
description:
Our resident Module Runner Unati tries her hand at homebrewing in today's campaign setting, inspired by a piece of Southern African History known as Mfecane or 'The Crushing, when Shaka Zulu forced many tribes out of Southern Africa. 


If you enjoy this podcast please help us out by leaving a review and sharing with your fellow adventurers.

Support us on Patreon at patreon.com/tbhalflings for your Shirefolk Shoutout and Bonus Episodes.

Connect with us on Twitter, Instagram and Facebook @tbhalflings, on our Discord or email secondbreakfast@tbhalflings.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Our resident Module Runner Unati tries her hand at homebrewing in today's campaign setting, inspired by a piece of Southern African History known as Mfecane or 'The Crushing, when Shaka Zulu forced many tribes out of Southern Africa. 


If you enjoy this podcast please help us out by leaving a review and sharing with your fellow adventurers.
